summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; making appropriations from the Engineering Operating and Arterial Development Funds for the completion of plans, specifications and estimates and the construction of pedestrian and street related improvements along Broadway Avenue from East Madison to East Prospect (Broadway Access Improvements and L.I.D. No. 6710 Project); authorizing the hiring of consultants; and increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1981 Budget of the Engineering Department.
